00024 #pragma once
00025 
00026 #include "cinder/Cinder.h"
00027 #include "cinder/Function.h"
00028 
00029 namespace cinder { namespace app {
00030 
00031 template<typename T>
00032 struct EventCombiner {
00033     typedef void    result_type;
00034 
00035     EventCombiner() : mEvent( 0 ) {}
00036     EventCombiner( const T *event ) : mEvent( event ) {}
00037 
00038     template<typename InputIterator>
00039     void    operator()( InputIterator first, InputIterator last ) const
00040     {
00041         while( ( first != last ) && ( ! mEvent->isHandled() ) ) {
00042             *first++;
00043         }
00044     }
00045     
00046     const T     *mEvent;
00047 };
00048 
00049 class Window;
00050 typedef std::shared_ptr<Window>     WindowRef;
00051 
00053 class Event {
00054   public:
00056     bool        isHandled() const { return mHandled; }
00058     void        setHandled( bool handled = true ) { mHandled = handled; }
00059 
00061     WindowRef   getWindow() const { return mWindow; }
00062     void        setWindow( const WindowRef &window ) { mWindow = window; }
00063 
00064   protected:
00065     Event() : mHandled( false ) {}
00066     Event( WindowRef window ) : mWindow( window ), mHandled( false ) {}
00067 
00068   public:
00069     virtual ~Event() {}
00070     
00071     bool            mHandled;
00072     WindowRef       mWindow;
00073 };
00074 
00075 } } // namespace cinder::app
